reach_display.midnightconfig.title: Reach Display
reach_display.midnightconfig.showPlayers: Whether only distances to players should be shown
reach_display.midnightconfig.averageHitM:
Local Average: Counts all the hits in a given session

Global Average: Counts lifetime hits (saved in a txt file)

Last Hits: Counts last X hits (defined by the field below)
reach_display.midnightconfig.averageNumb: Determines number of hits counting towards Last Hits average
